_header: Bird on briar I tell it
_description: Fragment of a love song, preserved as an indication of tune of carol 2222

CamGon383.Transcription: Bryd on brere y telle yt to non oþur y ne dare
CamGon383.Note:
Written before the burden; written and deleted after stanza
                    1.
